text: Cumilla District is a district in the eastern region of Bangladesh, near the Tripura Division. Today it is a part of the Chittagong Division. Cities under Cumilla district include: *Feni Thana *Noakhali Thana *Lakshimpur Thana *Chandpur Thana *Brahmanbaria Thana *Comilla Thana *Laksam Category:Districts of British India Category:Districts of East Pakistan Category:Districts in Chittagong Division
title: Cumilla District
